com.gitlab.librebob.Athenaeum â€‹com.gitlab.librebob.Athenaeum.desktop CC0 GPL-3.0+ Athenaeum A libre replacement for Steam
Athenaeum is a game laucher and manager designed as a libre replacement for Steam.
It's built with PyQt5 and utilizes the flatpak application container system.
